title: Norris

|   | A relaxed water cultist with a healthy tan and a soothing voice. He doesn't really care if it is you or he who dies — “both” would probably be the best option.***““Death and death alone gives meaning to life and this meaning is entirely negative.” -Georges Poulet. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Norris the Philosopher** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") spellcaster. He arrives with a band of [skysharks](/Skyshark "Skyshark"), confusing melee attacks, and a number of perplexing spells.

In addition to his spells, Norris constantly has an aura of [shallow water](/Shallow_water "Shallow water") around him, similar to [water nymphs](/Water_nymph "Water nymph").

## Location

- [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls")
- [The Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"):1-4
- [The Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"):1-3

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                  |                                                     |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Brain Bite](/Brain_Bite "Brain Bite") (4-8\*)   | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Primal Wave](/Primal_Wave "Primal Wave") (3d26) | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Like [tarantellas](/Tarantella "Tarantella"), his melee confusion can only be resisted by [clarity](/Clarity "Clarity"). [Mummies](/Mummies "Mummies") in particular should watch out.
- Primal Wave knocks you back, so watch out when using [stairs](/Stair "Stair").

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), Norris will get [Draining Gaze](/Draining_Gaze "Draining Gaze") instead of [Brain Bite](/Brain_Bite "Brain Bite").
- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Norris was re-introduced.

* Prior to this version, Norris was known as Norris the Nihilist, and did not have skysharks or a water aura. His spells were [Brain Feed](/Brain_Feed "Brain Feed"), [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting"), [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility"), [Confuse](/Confuse "Confuse"), and [Paralyse](/Paralyse "Paralyse").

- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Norris bit the dust.
- In ancient versions of *Crawl*, Norris' tile showed him carrying a surfboard. This is reintroduced as of 0.31.
html:
Norris

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Norris @ 
HP 138-280
HD 20
XP 2308
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 9
Will 140
Attack1 36 (hit: confuse)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags See invisible
Evil
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Male
A relaxed water cultist with a healthy tan and a soothing voice. He doesn't really care if it is you or he who dies — “both” would probably be the best option.

““Death and death alone gives meaning to life and this meaning is entirely negative.”

-Georges Poulet.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Norris the Philosopher is a unique spellcaster. He arrives with a band of skysharks, confusing melee attacks, and a number of perplexing spells.

In addition to his spells, Norris constantly has an aura of shallow water around him, similar to water nymphs.

Location

  • Elven Halls
  • The Vaults:1-4
  • The Depths:1-3

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Brain Bite (4-8*) Priest flag
Slot2 Primal Wave (3d26) Priest flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Like tarantellas, his melee confusion can only be resisted by clarity. Mummies in particular should watch out.
  • Primal Wave knocks you back, so watch out when using stairs.

History

  • In 0.32, Norris will get Draining Gaze instead of Brain Bite.
  • In 0.31, Norris was re-introduced.
Prior to this version, Norris was known as Norris the Nihilist, and did not have skysharks or a water aura. His spells were Brain Feed, Smiting, Invisibility, Confuse, and Paralyse.
  • In 0.19, Norris bit the dust.
  • In ancient versions of Crawl, Norris' tile showed him carrying a surfboard. This is reintroduced as of 0.31.

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Norris the Philosopher''' is a [[unique]] spellcaster. He arrives with a band of [[skyshark]]s, confusing melee attacks, and a number of perplexing spells.

In addition to his spells, Norris constantly has an aura of [[shallow water]] around him, similar to [[water nymph]]s.

==Location==
*[[Elven Halls]]
*[[The Vaults]]:1-4
*[[The Depths]]:1-3

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Like [[tarantella]]s, his melee confusion can only be resisted by [[clarity]]. [[Mummies]] in particular should watch out.
*Primal Wave knocks you back, so watch out when using [[stair]]s.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|Norris will get [[Draining Gaze]] instead of [[Brain Bite]].}}
*In [[0.31]], Norris was re-introduced.
:Prior to this version, Norris was known as Norris the Nihilist, and did not have skysharks or a water aura. His spells were [[Brain Feed]], [[Smiting]], [[Invisibility]], [[Confuse]], and [[Paralyse]].
*In [[0.19]], Norris bit the dust.
*In ancient versions of ''Crawl'', Norris' tile showed him carrying a surfboard. This is reintroduced as of 0.31.

[[Category:Human]]
